LanguageData.RC2_MakeVegetableJuice.label: make vegetable juice
LanguageData.RC2_MakeVegetableJuice.description: Uses one or more vegetables to make delicious juice. Makes 5.
LanguageData.RC2_MakeTonicSoda.label: make tonic soda
LanguageData.RC2_MakeTonicSoda.description: Uses any kind of sweetener to make bubbly tonic soda. Makes 5.
LanguageData.RC2_MakeFruitSoda.label: make fruit soda
LanguageData.RC2_MakeFruitSoda.description: Uses any kind of sweetener and a mix of fruits to make bubbly fruit soda. Makes 5.
LanguageData.RC2_MakeEggnog.label: make eggnog
LanguageData.RC2_MakeEggnog.description: Make eggnog from eggs, milk, and sweeteners. Mmmm. Makes 5.
LanguageData.RC2_ProcessEnergyDrink.label: make energy drinks
LanguageData.RC2_ProcessEnergyDrink.description: Mix sugar, coffee beans or tea leaves to make energy drinks.Makes 5.
LanguageData.RC2_MakeHotCocoa.label: make hot cocoa
LanguageData.RC2_MakeHotCocoa.description: Combines delicious chocolate and milk for a belly-warming treat. Great for cold winter nights! Makes 5.
LanguageData.RC2_MakeIcedTea.label: make iced tea
LanguageData.RC2_MakeIcedTea.description: Combines tea, a sweetener, and some fruit into a delicious drink fantastic for hot summer days. Makes 5.
